short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension would be designed to automatically remove the consent cookie banner that appears on Stack Overflow's website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome extension would be designed to automatically remove the consent cookie banner that appears on Stack Overflow's website.

When a user visits Stack Overflow, the extension will detect the presence of the cookie banner and immediately remove it from the page. This will allow users to access the website without having to click the "Accept" button on the cookie banner each time they visit.

The extension will be simple and easy to use, with no complex configuration required. Once installed, it will work automatically in the background, removing the cookie banner every time the user visits Stack Overflow.

To ensure that the user's privacy is protected, the extension will not collect any data or personal information from the user. It will only interact with the cookie banner on Stack Overflow's website and remove it from the page.

Overall, this extension will provide a convenient and hassle-free browsing experience for users who frequently visit Stack Overflow, by removing the need for them to constantly interact with the cookie banner.
